tp:error.name: Unknown Connection
tp:error.tp:docstring: Connection was not provided by any known settings service.

tp:error.name: Invalid Service
tp:error.tp:docstring: Invalid settings service (not a recognized system or user settings service name).

tp:error.name: System Connection
tp:error.tp:docstring: Connection was superseded by a system connection.

tp:error.name: Permission Denied
tp:error.tp:docstring: User does not have the permission to activate this connection.
